overview: Amelia and her teen son Rex move to an opulent neighborhood after the failure of her husband’s business and his subsequent death. While Amelia and Rex try to embrace this glamorous new world, Rex starts dating Darla, who Amelia gets immediately attached to. So it come as shock when Darla accuses Rex of something unthinkable, and Amelia must decide who to trust and who to protect – her son, Darla, or herself.
title: How to Frame a Family
